title: Most valuable sport athlete brands worldwide 2017
yAxis: Brand value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories for the x axis representing Player, and a y axis representing Brand value in million U.S. dollars.
The highest category is found at Roger_Federer where Brand value in million U.S. dollars is 37.2.
The lowest category is found at Stephen_Curry where Brand value in million U.S. dollars is 13.4.
gold: The statistic shows a ranking of the most valuable sports athletes brands in the world in 2017 . The most valuable athlete brand in 2017 is Roger Federer .
